name: Learn Unity
tagline: Unity project examples for the book Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development
body:
This is the GitHub page for the upcoming book, Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development, currently available as an [Apress alpha book](http://www.apress.com/9781430248750 Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development).

The GitHub projects, built up cumulatively through each chapter, do not include assets from the Unity Asset Store and Standard Assets that are used in the book, but the HyperBowl-style bowling game developed by following the book, complete with Asset Store assets and Unity Standard Assets, is [on the App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/app/learn-unity/id634845779 Learn Unity app).

The book and app demonstrate Unity graphics, audio and physics, scripting in JavaScript (and a little bit of C#), touch screen and accelerometer input, iAd banner and interstitial ads, Game Center leaderboard and achievements, complete bowling rules, and utilize free Asset Store packages:

* [Eighteen Free Substances](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/1352) from [Allegorithmic](http://allegorithmic.com)
* [Free ArtskillZ Texture Pack 01](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/351) from [ArtskillZ](http://artskillz.net)
* [Skeletons Pack](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/1818) from [bisaniyehocam](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/publisher/645)
* [General Music Set](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/2589) from [Gianmarco Leone](http://gianmarcoleone.com/)
* [Free SFX Package](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/5178) from [Bleep Blop Audio](http://bleepblopaudio.com/)
* [Barrel](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/840) from [Universal Image](http://monstertruckherohd.com/)

The book also covers debugging, profiling and optimization, testing with the Unity Remote and iOS Simulator, build and App Store submission procedures

Questions can be posted on the [Unity forum](http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/173210-Learn-Unity-for-iOS-Game-Development), any of my Facebook pages ([Technicat](http://facebook.com/technicatllc), [Fugu Games](http://facebook.com/fugugames) or [HyperBowl](http://facebook.com/hyperbowl)) and on [twitter](http://twitter.com/fugugames).

You may also be interested in Sue Blackman's [Beginning 3D Game Development with Unity](http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/93775-Beginning-3D-Game-Development-with-Unity/page17), also from Apress.

Technical review provided by March Shaerer of [Gayasoft](http://gayasoft.ch).
